peril.model.board

Class ModelCountry

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • peril.model.board.ModelCountry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer, Country

    public final class ModelCountry
extends java.util.Observable
implements Country, java.util.Observer
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a country that has a ModelArmy.
    Since:
    2018-03-16
    Version:
    1.01.03
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, James_Rowntree
    See Also:
    Observable, Observer, Country

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ModelArmy army
      Holds the ModelArmy at this ModelCountry.
      private ModelColor color
      The ModelColor of this ModelCountry in the level file.
      private java.lang.String name
      Holds the name of the ModelCountry.
      private java.util.Map<ModelCountry,ModelLink> neighbours
      Holds the ModelCountrys that this ModelCountry is linked to.
      private ModelPlayer ruler
      Holds the ModelPlayer that rules this ModelCountry.

    • Field Detail

      • neighbours

        private final java.util.Map<ModelCountry,ModelLink> neighbours
        Holds the ModelCountrys that this ModelCountry is linked to. The link between each of the ModelCountrys is defined by ModelLink.

      • army

        private final ModelArmy army
        Holds the ModelArmy at this ModelCountry.

      • name

        private final java.lang.String name
        Holds the name of the ModelCountry.

      • color

        private final ModelColor color
        The ModelColor of this ModelCountry in the level file.

      • ruler

        private volatile ModelPlayer ruler
        Holds the ModelPlayer that rules this ModelCountry.

      • ModelCountry

        public ModelCountry(java.lang.String name,
                    ModelColor color)
        Constructs a new ModelCountry with a specified army offset.
        Parameters:
        name - of the ModelCountry
        color - The colour that denotes this ModelCountry in the countries image.

      • endRound

        public void endRound(ModelHazard hazard)
        Performs the end round operation for this ModelCountry.
        Parameters:
        hazard - The ModelHazard that should act on this ModelCountry.

      • changeLinkTo

        public void changeLinkTo(ModelCountry country,
                         ModelLinkState linkState,
                         int duration)
        Changes the ModelLinkState of the ModelLink between this ModelCountry and a specified neighbour ModelCountry.
        Parameters:
        country - ModelCountry
        linkState - ModelLinkState
        duration - Number of rounds before this link will reset back to its default.

        link - The ModelLink between the two ModelCountrys.
